channel.title: CVE Feed for General Electric -- Reason S20 Ethernet Switch
channel.description: The latest CVEs for General Electric -- Reason S20 Ethernet Switch

item.title: CVE-2020-16242|2024-09-17T00:40:34.187Z -- general%20electric -- reason%20s20%20ethernet%20switch
item.description: The affected Reason S20 Ethernet Switch is vulnerable to cross-site scripting (XSS), which may allow an attacker to trick application users into performing critical application actions that include, but are not limited to, adding and updating accounts.

item.title: CVE-2020-16246|2024-09-17T00:47:00.232Z -- general%20electric -- reason%20s20%20ethernet%20switch
item.description: The affected Reason S20 Ethernet Switch is vulnerable to cross-site scripting (XSS), which may allow attackers to trick users into following a link or navigating to a page that posts a malicious JavaScript statement to the vulnerable site, causing the malicious JavaScript to be rendered by the site and executed by the victim client.
